## Deployment Instructions
- Cannot build on VPS — must prebuild locally and push the .next/ build output to the repo.
- VPS deployment is git pull + npm install --production + npm start only.
- The VPS deployment directory for the Polymarket bot is /opt/Poly.
- The pm2 process name for the Polymarket bot on the VPS is "polybot".
